attributes.action: Make Mary Creagh Resign for not supporting Wakefield's wishes to Vote for Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
report on her refusing to back the people of wakefield's wishes.. http://www.wakefieldexpress.co.uk/news/mary-creagh-to-vote-against-brexit-bill-1-8366050

In the last brexit related vote in Parliament on 8/12, Mary Creagh again disregarded what Wakefield Voted for and didn't even both registering her vote.
attributes.background: The people of Wakefield voted at just over 66% for Brexit. Mary Creagh has announced that she is voting against the bill to trigger article 50 and is doing this in the best interests of her constituants. She is completely ignoring the wishes of Wakefield again and acting in her own interests

rejection.details: Whether or not to resign is a matter for an individual MP. The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
